subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Seattle (10-6), a 5½-point favorite to win at Minnesota (11-5) on Sunday, has the potential to be a dangerous team in the N.F.L. playoffs.
snippet: Seattle (10-6), a 5½-point favorite to win at Minnesota (11-5) on Sunday, has the potential to be a dangerous team in the N.F.L. playoffs.
